title.rendered: The Drum Agency Business Awards 2019: The Results

content.rendered:
And the winner is…

Not us! 🙁

Okay so we didn’t win at The Drum Agency Business Awards, but we’re not sore losers about it! We had a brilliant night and can hold our heads high in the knowledge of the great achievements we’ve had in 2019.

We were up for the Marketing Agency of the Year in the 0-50 Staff category and came up against some tough competition from some of the UK’s best small agencies.

We’d like to thank The Drum for the nomination and allowing us to celebrate amongst the best and brightest in the marketing world. And massive congratulations to the winners from the evening, as well as the other nominees.

We’ll leave you with a small exert from our entry:

For Harrison Carloss, the past twelve months has seen a huge transformation, not only in our change if identity, nor simply in a complete agency restructuring, but in the way we work, in our capabilities, in how we see ourselves and our aspirations for the future.

Yes, we’ve accomplished a great deal in a short space of time, but that’s nothing compared with where we intend to be in the next twelve months. Now there’s no stopping us.

We’re Harrison Carloss, a force to be reckoned with, and you ain’t seen nothing yet!

HEY, YOU! YES, YOU!

Like what you’ve read? Read more at the Harrison Carloss blog and get the latest news and insights from the world of marketing. Or maybe you fancy getting creative with us? Check out our full range of services on our website and see what we could do for your business. If you are pretty sure you don’t have a cousin who can do our job better, get in touch today.
